com.bizosys.hsearch.common
Class HDocument

java.lang.Object
  com.bizosys.hsearch.common.HDocument

public class HDocument
extends java.lang.Object

This object carries all information necessary for indexing a document. This object is also serializable and client can provide it as a XML document (REST API).

See Also:
GeoId

Field Detail

l

public static org.apache.log4j.Logger l

bucketId

public java.lang.Long bucketId
Document Merged Storage(Bucket) Number

docSerialId

public java.lang.Short docSerialId
Document Serial number inside the merged storage (Bucket)

key

public java.lang.String key
This is the original Id of the document. This id usually flows from the original document source e.g. Primary Key of a database table. The mapped bucket Id and document serial number inside bucket represents uniqueness inside the index.

url

public java.lang.String url
URL for accessing the document directly

title

public java.lang.String title
Document title. This also shows in the search result record title

preview

public java.lang.String preview
The Preview text on the document. It can be URL to an image or inline XML information.

cacheText

public java.lang.String cacheText
The matching section of the search word occurance is picked from the cached text sections

fields

public java.util.List<Field> fields
Document content Fields

citationTo

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> citationTo
Manually supplied list of citation mentioned in the document

citationFrom

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> citationFrom
Manually supplied list of citations from other documents

viewPermission

public AccessDefn viewPermission
Who has view access to this document

editPermission

public AccessDefn editPermission
Who has edit access of this document

state

public java.lang.String state
The state of the docucment (Applied, Processed, Active, Inactive)

tenant

public java.lang.String tenant
The tenant

team

public java.lang.String team
Just the Organization Unit (HR, PRODUCTION, SI) If there are multi level separate it with \ or .

eastering

public java.lang.Float eastering
Easting refers to the eastward-measured distance (or the x-coordinate) Use GeoId.convertLatLng method for getting nothing eastering from a given latitude and longitude.

northing

public java.lang.Float northing
northing refers to the northward-measured distance (or the y-coordinate). Use GeoId.convertLatLng method for getting nothing eastering from a given latitude and longitude.

weight

public int weight
This Default weight of the document. Few examples for computing the weight are
  • Editor assigned
  • Default weight assigned to the document source e.g. pages from wikipedia.org
  • Default weight assigned to the document editor e.g. blogs from CEO
    •

    docType

    public java.lang.String docType
    Document Type. It's the record type. Use DocumentType class to define default document types.

    tags

    public java.util.List<java.lang.String> tags
    These are author keywords or meta section of the page

    socialText

    public java.util.List<java.lang.String> socialText
    These are user keywords formed from the search terms

    createdOn

    public java.util.Date createdOn
    Document creation date

    modifiedOn

    public java.util.Date modifiedOn
    Document updation date

    validTill

    public java.util.Date validTill
    When the document is scheduled to die or died

    ipAddress

    public java.lang.String ipAddress
    From which IP address is this document created. This is specially for machine proximity ranking.

    securityHigh

    public boolean securityHigh
    High Security setting. During high security, the information kept encrypted.

    sentimentPositive

    public boolean sentimentPositive
    By default the sentiment is positive.

    locale

    public java.util.Locale locale
    Document Language. Default is English
